channel.title: Automager
channel.description: i need a auto mager please as my mage level is 1 (he he) and it takes too long to buy the runes, click the attack everytime and that sort of thing you knowP.S. hope you help me :) ;) :D :cool: :rolleyes: :P :| ;D

item.title: Automager
item.dc:creator: @the_scar_noob the scar noob
item.description:
@the_scar_noob wrote:

well can you give us more information, also it depends on the lvl’s etc
like when you are lvl 38 (combat) and the monster you’re attacking is lower than you, than we can use IsUpText to be sure that it is the monster, when your combat lvl is lower than the one from the monster we haven’t got that IsUpText “failsafe”, than we also have a bigger change to be banned, because than we have to do this:
search for color, right click, check text we can click, when you can attack we attack

so when we find the color, we right click and oops it wasn’t a monster, but it was a tomato, ok we’ll try again, but… oops… now it was a guy passing with dull dragon… you see what i’m meaning?

just give us more details plz, than we can be able to help you

Thank you,
The Scar Noob.

Read full topic
